summary: This mod provides 100 small rooms and big room for followers.
descriptionHtml:
Followers Private Rooms is home located near Whiterun.

This simple home is for users who have many followers and don't want to lose sight of where in a house followers are.

First floor has 100 trap doors to each small rooms.
Second Floor has 100 trap doors to big room. Big room has Navmesh on the specific location.


100 small rooms have equipment different respectively.

Big room has Navmesh only on trapdoors.
Followers who live in big room can not go around, so they keep standing.
Note: Please be sure to assign a house to followers in the state that Dovahkiin stands on the trap door.

Recommended mods:ï¼šMHIYH
No DLC's are required.
author: YorN
